channel.title: Is this anxiety?
channel.description: Alright so I was doing some research into anxiety and all examples I found of it harming people was that it stopped them going to social events or made them self conscious, take drugs, drink or eat too much. But I have these small anxiety periods a while after an event. So say I went to a party, I'm fine not anxious at all but then the day after, at home, alone I get really powerful waves of anxiety while thinking about what happened. Now surely this is the reverse of anticipation anxiety, I was just wondering what the reverse actually was.

do you drink at these parties?
[/quote]
Yes, alot?[/quote]

Only asked because I have various anxiety shits (panic disorder is fun) and I always find the day after getting shitfaced is worse. no idea why

Read full topic

item.title: Is this anxiety?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

i sometimes get this if a party goes wrong or something happens, but then i just think who the fuck cares, and realise that in a week I wont even remember what I was worrying about.

Read full topic

You could just get your mind off of it (if possible).

ye this happens to me, but i drink alot and usually do somethin gay whether it be snog some ugly bitch / get in a fight / throw up (dis only happened twice actually but pisses me off) also if i do shit like smoke which my parents dont like, but ye anyways bro d/w bout it jus fuck it like who cares man i mean ye, dis shit is like not even a problem really man

item.title: Is this anxiety?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“cows_be_sacred, post:2, topic:313011”][quote author=goatee link=topic=409525.msg3021824#msg3021824 date=1257638200]
Alright so I was doing some research into anxiety and all examples I found of it harming people was that it stopped them going to social events or made them self conscious, take drugs, drink or eat too much. But I have these small anxiety periods a while after an event. So say I went to a party, I’m fine not anxious at all but then the day after, at home, alone I get really powerful waves of anxiety while thinking about what happened. Now surely this is the reverse of anticipation anxiety, I was just wondering what the reverse actually was.
[/quote]
Did you perhaps do something that should not have been done?[/quote]
I basically just have alot of fun? Nothing that puts a strain on my conscience.

Mopman:

do you drink at these parties?

Yes, alot?

[quote=“Not X A Alex, post:4, topic:313011”]take a xanax bro
feels good bro bro[/quote]
Medication can be pretty gay for anxiety. (addictive)

T4_:

I am not sure, but I understand what you’re talking about. Are the thoughts about your impression on other people or…?

Sometimes, mainly reflections.

Read full topic
